channel.title: WolfScape ll Pure Pk ll Summoning ll skills ll econ ll Vote4Ca$h ll loads of v2
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/8619/45226384.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/r9bn8nz4fxad/WolfScape_Client.rar]Download[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://www.wolfscape.tk/play.html]Play now[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.wolfscape.tk]Website[/url] [size=2em]WolfScape Features[/size] Working MoneyPouch! dupe in the MoneyPouch Drop Dupe[/center][center]Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 LevelPoints with a Store custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim 100% Timed mute 100% Timed Ban Smithing (x5, x10) 120 Dungeoneering The Arrow Dupe Glitch Server AutoSave Lag when banking all Player Titles Auto-Server Save UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable) SOF InterFace KillStreak Point System Made KS give you extra PK Points Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1) Custom Npc Shops Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Fixed Crowns in Pc, Pm, and chat Admins and Owners dont share same crowns Comp Cape requireing all 99s. Zoom in and Zoom out feature New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco Vote point shop Tokkul Shop 2b Ticket Exchange New member rank timedmute timedban SollyStore Nice Player ritles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Made a lot of things Fixed Freezing in Wise old man New staff capes And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!
[size=2em]media[/size] [/center][center][img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/2568/97771193.png[/img] [/center][center][img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/6286/22389405.png[/img] [/center][center][img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/395/15396972.png[/img] [/center][center][img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/1345/64105263.png[/img] [/center][center][img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8131/79563011.png[/img] [/center][center][img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/291/58129014.png[/img] [/center][center][font=impact][size=2em] WolfScape every 1 is welcome to this server exept dupers![/size][/font]
[size=5]WolfScape is corecly looking for Staff members we want member who we can trust and members that got alot of experiance if u think you are 1 of them pm me and we will talk[/size]
[/center][center][size=14pt]Credits[/size] [size=12pt]TrisidiaX (80%)[/size] [size=12pt]me (10%)[/size][/center]

dupe in the MoneyPouch
Drop Dupe[/center][center]Summoning Orb With Draining

custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands

Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn

Fixed Total Level
Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items]

100% Timed Ban
Smithing (x5, x10)

Player Titles

UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable)
SOF InterFace
KillStreak Point System
Made KS give you extra PK Points

Custom Npc Shops
Added in dice command for Donator+
New Interfaces
Fixed Crowns in Pc, Pm, and chat
Admins and Owners dont share same crowns
Comp Cape requireing all 99s.
Zoom in and Zoom out feature
New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank

New ::Help method
Better Prayer
Better Eco

Tokkul Shop
2b Ticket Exchange
New member rank
timedmute

Nice Player ritles With a good Interface

Summoning Working
Fixed Charms
Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones)
Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not.
Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to
Awesome Donator Benifits
Made a lot of things
Fixed Freezing in Wise old man
New staff capes
And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!
